activities.description: Execute copy db to blob storage pipeline

activities.name: Databricks_ABN_SEARCH_Notebook
activities.description: Execute ABN_SEARCH_Notebook

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(getdate()), 1,4)  as  currentyear
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(getdate()),6,2)  as  currentmonth
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(getdate()),9,2)  as  currentdayofmonth
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(dateadd(DAY,-1,getdate())), 1,4)  as  yesterdayyear
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(dateadd(DAY,-1,getdate())),6,2)  as  yesterdaymonth
	,substring(dbo.udf_covert_utc_to_local_Datetime(dateadd(DAY,-1,getdate())),9,2)  as  yesterdaydayofmonth

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
		ss.*, STD.TableID
 From 
 (

	 SELECT 
		sourceid, Fileserverlocation, FileFolderPath,value as STATION_POINT_NAME
	FROM  ETL.SourceSystem 
		cross apply STRING_SPLIT(filefoldername, ',')
	where sourceid = @{pipeline().parameters.SourceID}

) SS join  [ETL].[SourceTableDetails] STD on STD.sourceid = ss.sourceid
and TargetBlobFileName = ss.STATION_POINT_NAME

expression.value: @and(contains(activity('Query EA Job History').output,'firstRow'), equals(activity('Query EA Job History').output.Firstrow['JobOutCome'],1))

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select top(1 ) SUCCESS  as JobOutCome from dbo.z_run_history 
where cast(START_TIME as date) = cast(GETDATE() as date)  

order by RUN_ID desc

expression.value: @not(and(contains(activity('Query EA Job History').output,'firstRow'), equals(activity('Query EA Job History').output.Firstrow['JobOutCome'],1)))
